verses.name: Mark 13:15
verses.text: And let him that is on the housetop not go down into the house, neither enter therein, to take any thing out of his house:

verses.name: Mark 13:16
verses.text: And let him that is in the field not turn back again for to take up his garment.

verses.name: Mark 13:17
verses.text: But woe to them that are with child, and to them that give suck in those days!

verses.name: Mark 13:18
verses.text: And pray ye that your flight be not in the winter.

verses.name: Mark 13:19
verses.text: For in those days shall be affliction, such as was not from the beginning of the creation which God created unto this time, neither shall be.
